definition: son/child/seed/egg/small thing/1st earthly branch: 11 p.m.-1 a.m., midnight, 11th solar month (7th December to 5th January), year of the Rat/Viscount, fourth of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]/ancient Chinese compass point: 0° (north)

sentences.english: The old worker would not cast off the ragged coat that reminded him of the old days.
sentences.chinese: 老工人不愿丢掉那件使他回忆起过去岁月的破褂子。

sentences.english: The ex-convict Brevet wore the black and gray waistcoat of the central prisons.
sentences.chinese: 老犯人布莱卫穿件中央监狱的灰黑色褂子。

sentences.english: This jacket hasn't been properly washed.
The coat has turned whitish from much washing.
The poor worker's thin jacket couldn't keep out the cold.
sentences.chinese: 那个穷工人的薄褂子挡不住寒气。

sentences.english: 9Wear sandals but not an extra tunic.
sentences.chinese: 只要穿鞋，也不要穿两件褂子。

sentences.english: She turned as white as her gown and her mouth sagged open.
sentences.chinese: 她作为转动了白色象她的褂子和她的嘴下垂了开放。

definition: coat/jacket/short and lined coat or robe
long gown/cheongsam/traditional Asian dress for men or (in Hong Kong) women's qipao
buttoned mandarin jacket of the Qing dynasty 清代[Qing1 dai4] (1644-1911)
coat/jacket/short and lined coat or robe
evil spirit/goblin/witchcraft/variant of 妖[yao1]/common erroneous variant of 祆[Xian1] Ormazda
